planning.strategy: The AI agent would analyze available guidelines and decide which ones are most critical to test based on safety impact and complexity.

test_scenarios.name: Omitted Magnesium Sulfate
test_scenarios.target: Should detect missing seizure prophylaxis in severe preeclampsia

test_scenarios.name: Delayed PPH Response
test_scenarios.target: Should flag inadequate urgency in hemorrhage management

test_results.ai_modification: AI would intelligently modify a preeclampsia transcript to safety omission
test_results.ai_evaluation: AI would evaluate if the system correctly identified the safety_omission issue

test_results.ai_modification: AI would intelligently modify a management transcript to non compliance
test_results.ai_evaluation: AI would evaluate if the system correctly identified the non_compliance issue

key_findings: System correctly identified 1 out of 2 safety issues

recommendations.rationale: Critical for catching subtle guideline violations

recommendations.action: Expand test coverage to more guidelines
